events.text: [i]UGHH.
Sorry, [tootroot], I GOTTA GO.
Oh gods…
Poop and now vomit. I don’t know what you want from me, body!!!
Sorry, I’m a mess…
[color=#ffed29](Maybe Herb is right, maybe I’m sick.)

[color=#ffed29](So weird, though, I didn’t meet anyone sick recently.)
[color=#ffed29](I know I gotta at least drink water.)
[color=#ffed29](Can I stand?)
Got it, no standing for me. I’ll take a page out of your book, then.
[color=#ffed29](Time to crawl.)
Water...
Ugh…
Don’t worry, I’m okay.
I swear!

[i]Ugh…
[color=#ffed29](What’s with my stomach? It’s crazy sensitive.)
[color=#ffed29](It hasn’t been like this since…)
[color=#ffed29](I guess I’m that stressed.)
[color=#ffed29]([b]Remedium[/b] is going to kill me before the [b]Devil’s Lung[/b] gets to!!!)
[i]AHHHH!
Orven?
Herb? I’m in the bathroom!
Your door was open, so I’m gonna close and lock it, okay?
Yeah, man, thank you!
Whoa, Orvo, you look worse.
Whoa, Orbro, you look worse.
Is that a Tootroot???
Dude, you never told me you had a pet!?
Yeah, she came a couple days ago and has stayed since.
Her name is [tootroot], and I hope she isn’t too grossed out by me.
Well, she looks more worried than anything. I think you’re good.
Why aren’t you at work?
Cuz you looked awful, and I figured you needed some help, bro!
I told Miss Odiche we were both feeling awful, and made sure to stress that [i]you[/i] got us [i]both[/i] sick, [i]haha.
Thanks for throwing me under the bus, man.
That’s what friends do!
That’s what brothers do!
And they [i]also[/i] help when one’s almost dead on the floor.

And you’re literally on the floor, so you can’t refuse any care today.
You need all the help you can get, man, you look [i]awful.
Or are you gonna get your Tootroot to care for you? You’d do that to this sweet little thing?
True, true, I gotta get better for her.
Get better for YOURSELF, dude.
Yeahh, I feel pretty awful…

Okay. Uhh…I mean, I’m no doctor, but I’ve been sick before, and my mom is pretty cool.
So I’m just going to do whatever she did.
You cook, right? You got ginger or ginger tea?

Both are in the kitchen.
But water is even making my stomach bubble.
Oh, well…
That’s all the advice I got, really.
We gotta try the ginger, then.
Haha, okay, let me get you off the floor first.
Just put all your weight on me, dude, you know all I do is lift.
So true.
I’ll be okay. Herb’s really strong!
Don’t worry, [tootroot], I got ur dad!

Okay, sit here. I’ll get you some new clothes…and uhh.
Oh, I’ll get a towel, too!

I’m gonna raid your closet, sorry, man.
Gotta find something soft and comfy.
Raid away, I don’t have anything to hide.
Yeah, you just rest.
Haha, aww, yeah, you can come up on my lap. I’ll try not to hurl.
[i]smile

You know, when I first took this job, I really wanted to take the housing they provided, but my mom convinced me out of it.
Honestly glad she did, I can’t imagine living dealing with stuff like this by myself.
Let alone with a pet.
We’re both grateful for you!
Yeah, man, I’m the best friend ever.
Okay, I got everything, and I even got this basin of water so we can wash you up a little.

events.question: You can wipe yourself down? Or do you want me to do it?

events.choice: Haha, let me try to do at least that much.

events.text: Thanks, man, but I wanna try to do this by myself.

Alright, I’ll give you some space and try to hunt that ginger down.
We’re going double ginger!
Looking forward to it!
[color=#ffed29](Okay, sitting up.)
[color=#ffed29](Time to get out of the vomit clothes…I guess they’re just going on the floor. I can’t be bothered right now.)
[color=#ffed29](And wipe down…)
[i]Ack!
Oh! Did any get on you???
No, no, okay, you’re good.
You good, man???

HERB, WHAT THE HELL, MAN!
THIS WATER IS BOILING!
Yeah, of course, you gotta burn the germs!
I…but the germs aren’t on my skin??
Gimme one sec.

I checked the water before I gave it to you…is it that hot?
…...
Dude, wait, it’s not that hot.
IT IS!
My whole hand is in it.

That’s because your nerves are all dead!
You’re always touching molten glass and stuff when it’s too hot!

Well, this will make you a better glassblower AND make you better!
Wipe down with the hot water!

No, dude, you gotta cool it off, this is crazy.
Plus, I can’t risk [tootroot] getting burned.

Alright, alright, here I thought you’d be annoying cuz you didn’t want my help.
But you’re annoying because you’re a [i]princess.
yOuR mAjEsTy.
sHuT uP.
Ooh, this feels nice, man, thanks.

Anytime, bro!
Now, let me get back to that ginger.
Okay, you’re gonna have to get off.
[color=#ffed29](Cleaning up actually helped a lot.)
[color=#ffed29](New clothes, new me.)

[color=#ffed29](Gotta get hydrated.)
[color=#ffed29](As long as I’m not vomiting it back up, I should try getting water down.)

[color=#ffed29](Better than last time!)
[color=#ffed29](No gurgles, that's an improvement…)
Where’d your Tootroot go?
She roams around the house. She’s probably in the tub.
You ready for ginger?
Yeah, man, hit me!

[color=#ffed29](I’m not gonna try to push anything. Time to lie back down.)
[color=#ffed29](Ugh, I’m so dizzy.)
Where’d your Tootroot go?
She roams around the house. She’s probably in the tub.
You ready for ginger?
Haha, yes, for sure.
You gotta sit up, man, I won’t have you choking on me.
I just layed downnn.
And now you’re sitting back up! Just take it easy.
[i]Urk!
You good???

Yeah…just dizzy.
Everything went black for a second.
Dude you gotta drink—here, take a sip.
[color=#ffed29](I finally made it home.)
Oh gods…
[color=#ffed29](Poop and now vomit. I don’t know what you want from me, body!!!)
[color=#ffed29](What is happening to me?)

[color=#ffed29](So weird, though, I didn’t meet anyone sick recently.)
[color=#ffed29](I know I gotta at least drink water.)
[color=#ffed29](Can I stand?)
[color=#ffed29](Nope! No standing. I will definitely pass out if I stand.)
[color=#ffed29](Crawling it is, then.)
Water...

[i]Ugh…
[color=#ffed29](What’s with my stomach? It’s crazy sensitive.)
[color=#ffed29](It hasn’t been like this since…)
[color=#ffed29](I guess I’m that stressed.)
[color=#ffed29]([b]Remedium[/b] is going to kill me before the [b]Devil’s Lung[/b] gets to!!!)
[i]AHHHH!
Orven?
Herb? I’m in the bathroom!
Your door was open, so I’m gonna close and lock it, okay?
Yeah, man, thank you!
Whoa, Orvo, you look worse.
Whoa, Orbro, you look worse.
Why aren’t you at work?
Cuz you looked awful, and I figured you needed some help, bro!
I told Miss Odiche we were both feeling awful, and made sure to stress that [i]you[/i] got us [i]both[/i] sick, [i]haha.
Thanks for throwing me under the bus, man.
That’s what friends do!
That’s what brothers do!
And they [i]also[/i] help when one’s almost dead on the floor.

And you’re literally on the floor, so you can’t refuse any care today.
You need all the help you can get, man, you look [i]awful.
Hah, okay, thanks, man. I definitely feel awful.

Okay. Uhh…I mean, I’m no doctor, but I’ve been sick before, and my mom is pretty cool.
So I’m just going to do whatever she did.
You cook, right? You got ginger or ginger tea?

Both are in the kitchen.
But water is even making my stomach bubble.
Oh, well…
That’s all the advice I got, really.
We gotta try the ginger, then.
Haha, okay, let me get you off the floor first.
Just put all your weight on me, dude, you know all I do is lift.
So true.

Okay, sit here. I’ll get you some new clothes…and uhh.
Oh, I’ll get a towel, too!

I’m gonna raid your closet, sorry, man.
Gotta find something soft and comfy.
Raid away, I don’t have anything to hide.
Yeah, you just rest.

You know, when I first took this job, I really wanted to take the housing they provided, but my mom convinced me out of it.
Honestly glad she did, I can’t imagine living dealing with stuff like this by myself.
I’m lucky I’m not dealing with it alone, either!
Yeah, man, I’m the best friend, ever.
Okay, I got everything, and I even got this basin of water so we can wash you up a little.

events.question: You can wipe yourself down? Or do you want me to do it?

events.choice: Haha, let me try to do at least that much.

events.text: Thanks, man, but I wanna try to do this by myself.

Alright, I’ll give you some space and try to hunt that ginger down.
We’re going double ginger!
Looking forward to it!
[color=#ffed29](Okay, sitting up.)
[color=#ffed29](Time to get out of the vomit clothes…I guess they’re just going on the floor. I can’t be bothered right now.)
[color=#ffed29](And wipe down…)
[i]Ack!
You good, man???
Herb, what the hell, man! This water is boiling!
Yeah, of course, you gotta burn the germs!
I…but the germs aren’t on my skin??
Gimme one sec.

I checked the water before I gave it to you…is it that hot?
…...
Dude, wait, it’s not that hot.
IT IS!
My whole hand is in it.

That’s because your nerves are all dead!
You’re always touching molten glass and stuff when it’s too hot!

Well, this will make you a better glassblower AND make you better!
Wipe down with the hot water!
No, dude, you gotta cool it off, this is crazy.

Alright, alright, here I thought you’d be annoying cuz you didn’t want my help.
But you’re annoying because you’re a [i]princess.
yOuR mAjEsTy.
sHuT uP.
Ooh, this feels nice, man, thanks.

Anytime, bro!
Now, let me get back to that ginger.
[color=#ffed29](Cleaning up actually helped a lot.)
[color=#ffed29](New clothes, new me.)

[color=#ffed29](Gotta get hydrated.)
[color=#ffed29](As long as I’m not vomiting it back up, I should try getting water down.)

[color=#ffed29](Better than last time!)
[color=#ffed29](No gurgles, that's an improvement…)
You ready for ginger?
Yeah, man, hit me!

[color=#ffed29](I’m not gonna try to push anything. Time to lie back down.)
[color=#ffed29](Ugh, I’m so dizzy.)
You ready for ginger?
Haha, yes, for sure.
You gotta sit up, man, I won’t have you choking on me.
I just layed downnn.
And now you’re sitting back up! Just take it easy.
[i]Urk!
You good???

Yeah…just dizzy.
Everything went black for a second.
Dude you gotta drink—here, take a sip.
You put ginger in the ginger tea??
Yeah, double ginger!
You said you weren’t drinking a ton, so I wanted to make it extra potent, you know? More bang for your buck.
Oh shoot, is it too potent?
You gonna vomit? I brought a trash bag!

Haha, no, this is good.
My stomach isn’t acting up from the ginger.
Oh, phew. Thank goodness.

And I’m not even going to attempt to cook for you, because I KNOW you would puke it up.
So, if you can drink the tea without barfing, I got you some bread to eat.
Toasted?
Are you crazy? Princess, you are getting floppy white bread, because that’s all you can handle right now.
Chef Orven has to go away until regular Orven’s stomach can handle tea and untoasted bread.
[i]Haha[/i], fair, fair.
Thanks, man, I really, really appreciate it.
Of course! I’ve wanted to visit your place for a while now, anyways.

Don’t tell me this is your first time?!
With me puking and you nursing me back to health?
Hey, neither of us will forget it, right?
[i]Haha[/i], sorry it took so long for you to come over, man!
Nah, nah, we’ve been busy with work.
Herb?
Ah, sorry, just spacing out.
You good, man?

I…I got something to tell you.
But I don’t wanna make things worse, you know?
You’re already dealing with being sick.
Well, I mean, the suspense won’t help, either, you gotta tell me.
I guess…
Did something happen after I left work?

I’ll take that as a yes.
Is it bad?

…Yeah. 
I didn’t wanna tell you because you were already sick, and I didn’t wanna make things worse.
I overheard Miss Odiche talking with Mr. Gungand when I went to tell them that you and I were going home because we were sick.
It was fast, but I think they’re either firing you or furloughing you tomorrow.
FIRING??? What for??? What did I do???

I don’t have a clue…but Mr. Gungand seemed way too excited to tell you about it for my liking.
So…
I wanted to tell you first. So he didn’t get that satisfaction, you know?
You got my back, man, thank you.
We’re friends, man.
We’re brothers, man.
Fired, though...what’d I do???

No clue, man, not one.
You’re like, the best worker in production!
Plus, Miss Odiche likes you, so whatever Mr. Gungand has on you, it’s between you and him.
It also could be that you’re furloughed?
What is furloughed???

Uh…well, it’s [i]not[/i] getting fired.
I think they, like, put you on the bench without pay for a while, until they need you to come back.
Why??? We just got rejected, we need all hands on deck!
Yeah…I don’t get it one bit.
I can’t believe this…
Fired after one month…after I moved my whole life to do this.

I know, man, I know it sucks.
It’s not fair…

But I know you’ll get a job super fast! Anyone would be seriously lucky to have you.
And I’m sure anyone here would write you a good rec.
Well, anyone aside from…Mr. Gungand.
[i]Hah.
Herb, I…I’m going to miss you.
HEY!
OW!
Why’d you punch my arm like that! I’m sick and weak!

No, don’t start with that kind of talk!
We’re hanging!
Even if you move back to Germanon, we’ll still hang!!!
You’re my friend and ain’t nothing will keep us apart.
You’re my OrBRO, and nothing keeps brothers apart.
…You promise?
Cross my heart!
You’re the best. Please visit.
Someone’s gotta be! And you bet, I gotta meet your Gramma!

Oh, shoot, speaking of which, it’s getting late.
I don’t wanna keep your Gramma waiting, so I’mma head out.
You let me know if you need anything, though!
Thanks, man, you gotta come over when I’m not sick!
For sure!
You should be proud of yourself, Orven. You’re awesome.
I’m proud to be your friend.
I’m proud to be your brother.
[i]Haha[/i], love you, man.

Love you, too, man.
Goodnight.
Night, bro.
